alert.note: Alert for Logan; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 10:26PM CST until March 05 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Logan County in central Illinois... Southeastern Tazewell County in central Illinois... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1026 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Green Valley, or 10 miles north of Mason City, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Delavan and Emden around 1030 PM CST. Tremont and Hopedale around 1040 PM CST. Mackinaw and Minier around 1045 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Goodfield and Deer Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 8 and 27. Interstate 74 between mile markers 108 and 109. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
